intro.paragraph1: Orbital Tembere setiraiti ine hunyanzvi hwekuita: chiyeuchidzo chiri muchadenga chakavhurika kune wese munhu anonzwisisa anogara kana akambogara paNyika.
intro.paragraph2: Kuburikidza nemitoo yeruzivo rwemichina, chero munhu anogona kutumira zita remumwe munhu kuTemberi, angave munhu akafa, munhu mupenyu zvakanyanya, kana chero munhu anofanirwa kurangarirwa.

sculpture.heading: The Sculpture
sculpture.paragraph1: Iyo artwork ine zvinhu zvitatu zvinoenderana-inotsamira: setiraiti yakanyanya kugadzirirwa kuchengetedza mabhiriyoni emazita; chivezwa cheruzhinji chinotsinhana ruzivo nesatellite; uye webhusaiti iyo vatori vechikamu vanotumira nayo mazita, kubva zvino kusvika vapfuura, kudenga.
sculpture.paragraph2: Sekuedza kwakasiyana-siyana, Orbital Tembere inogona kutorwa sechivezwa chesaiti-chaiyo, inogara nzvimbo. Icho zvakare chirongwa cheArtsat.

antenna.heading: Iyo Antenna SePublic Sculpture
antenna.paragraph2: Antenna inenge iri mukukurukurirana zvakananga ne orbital satellite iri kugadzirwa.
antenna.paragraph3: Nenzvimbo inopenya yegoridhe, ichiratidza denga pamusoro payo, inzvimbo yekutanga yekukurudzira vanhu vakawanda (kana hukama hwedu kune zviri 'kumusoro uko').
antenna.paragraph4: Kunyange zvivezwa zvisina kuiswa munzvimbo zhinji dzepasi, maFremu edu kubva kuPasi, ayo ari kudzora setiraiti, ari kutumira mazita pane imwe neimwe nzira.
antenna.paragraph5: Batsira kuunza chiono ichi kuguta rako-kuisa zvivezwa zveantenna zvinokurudzira nhaurirano nezvekuongorora nzvimbo, hunyanzvi, uye nzvimbo yedu yakagovaniswa muchadenga. Dzidza zvakawanda nezvekutsigira chirongwa .
